```{r knitr_setup, include=FALSE, purl=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(ncvreg) ## devtools::install_github("https://github.com/pbreheny/ncvreg/tree/bootstrap")
library(dplyr)
set.seed(1234)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  cache = FALSE, 
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#",
  echo = FALSE,
  fig.align="center",
  message = FALSE,
  tidy = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE)

devtools::load_all(quiet = TRUE)
```
